data.name: Phoenix Squadron
data.detailed_description:
IMPORTANT: Game is under heavy development and rework!

Phoenix Squadron is a Multiplayer Flight Action game with 22 Missions and 20 different variants of modern day aircraft! (And some new ones too!)

GAMEPLAY
Your aircraft comes with a defensive shield that regenerates, and for a good reason! getting hit without it can lead to a quick mission failure,
Equip 2 Different weapons ranging from rockets to railguns, Multiplayer includes 5 different modes:
Death Match - Fight up to 10 players in intense dogfights to find out who's the best!
Team Death Match - Team up with up to 5 players and play against up to 3 other teams of 5 in a furball
Capture The Flag - Play against 10 other players in an intense race to cap the enemy's flag!
Custom - Load up custom maps and game rules, Have fun!
COOP - Play with up to 4 other players on different arcade missions.

CONTENT
Fly in all of the Campaign maps in multiplayer and COOP!
The game features a music player and model viewer
All future games will be condensed into free DLC Campaigns (Don't want to release the same game again with the same multiplayer component)
Downloaded separately (Via free DLC) is a mod kit featuring layered skin templates, Map Editor is included in game.

data.short_description: IMPORTANT: Game is under heavy development and rework!Phoenix Squadron is a Multiplayer Flight Action game with 22 Missions and 20 different variants of modern day aircraft! (And some new ones too!)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DX12 seems to have issues with UE at the moment, Launch with DX11 if you experience crashes

mac_requirements.recommended:
